experiments.prompt_a:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
$GRID$
experiments.prompt_b:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another grid only I can see, are the same. First, I will provide my description and then we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same.
This is a description of my grid: $DESCRIPTION_A$ 
Now start your grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid: 
$GRID$
experiments.q_reprompt: Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
experiments.d_reprompt: Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your grid and the other grid described the same?  Write "DECISION: same grid" if you think they are the same grid or "DECISION: same grid" if you think they are different grids.
